tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Nice experience with the doctor. Takes time in explaining the observation on the reports and also explains about the prescriptions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We went to sir with breathing discomfort and swelling in legs for my wife. Obviously with lot of anxiety and fear.
He speaks simple ..no use of heavy medical words.. explained what has happened..what is the treatment..felt like meeting a friend.. after a week she feels so well..
He is very genuine and more over he has that gesture of "am here to help" kind of environment around . Thank you sir. I highly recommend. "Vaidyo narayano harihi" 

There are doctors who till today makes this statement true.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Went to see Dr for second opinion, to understand the seriousness of my mothers‚Äô condition (she has moderate MR for few years now)‚Ä¶ he saw previous reports and asked questions to understand my mom‚Äôs condition, then suggested to do echo want to understand the seriousness‚Ä¶ after echo he comforted my mother that the condition is not that serious and she need not worry much‚Ä¶ suggested her to do walking and continue the medication‚Ä¶ my mother felt quite relieved after the visit‚Ä¶ Dr was very friendly, the fact that he conversed in Kannada with mom also helped‚Ä¶
reply_text: Dear Prashanth , thanks for your review. I am glad Your mother is relieved of her anxiety of the disease . Kannada is my mother tongue and I am proud of it.  I Try my best to converse in the patients native language. It helps in better understanding of the situation and also makes the patient feel better. Thanks again for your review . Patient reviews and feedback helps me to serve them better .

review: We visited the hospital and it was for my father. He had undergone knee replacement surgery. *** ****** *** ***** Surgery happened in July and follow up consultation was once in 2 or 3 months. My father had diabetes and BP, medicines were prescribed, physio was also done. There was no much waiting time in the hospital. It will take 5-10 minutes. We need to visit again doctor. My father is able to see improvements and he is able to walk now. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am writing to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care & expertise  Dr Kumar Kenchappa has provided. During my recent medical emergency his prompt intervention  undoubtedly played a crucial role in saving my life. I am forever thankful for his dedication to his profession . I am truly fortunate to have had him as my doctor. I am grateful for the tireless efforts and hard work he does to make a positive impact on the lives of people like me. 
Thank you Dr Kumar Kenchappa ....Your commitment to excellence is commendable & I will always hold you in high regard. Your treatment has cured me in a very short time. Thank you again !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor Kumar was very helpful and friendly everytime when I visit him for my dad. He explained the problem very well and solved the problem in constructive manner. My dad is doing well now and feeling much better now. Very much satisfied with doctor in all aspects.

Thanks,
Dipanjan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He us very friendly,makes us understand the problems ,gives guidance about medicines and refers people who gives a huge discount on medicines Understands the patients problems gives enough time to us and available anytime to converse either by mobile or messages where other Dr 's don't do....lots more

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Simple, professional, soft spoken, ************** approachable and top of it, friendly. Humanitarian. 
This is what I felt during my angioplasty treatment by him. 
Best part was, when my stent procedure was over, he asked my whether I would like to speak to my wife. He allowed her to meet me. 
I felt and saw the other side of the doctor. The human touch inside him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Kumar is confident in speaking with no ambiguity. At Jayadeva hospital it was concluded that my mother's hand to be amputed. Dr. Kumar tested for 10 minutes and confidentiality said hand need not be amputed. My mother's feeling on hearing it can't be explained. He brought back Life to our family. I liked the the way he treats the patient. He doesn't speak much or less. He clearly knows what treatment to be given. If something is not required, he clearly says such things are not required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Hypertension Treatment, Echo (pediatric & adult) ,Heart Conditions,Heart Care,
review:
My wife suffered from sudden tiredness, weakness in limbs, breathing difficulty low O2 saturation levels.
We consulted Dr. Kumar at the Sparsh Hospital, Infantry Road, Bangalore,, who provided instant treatment with reasonable medication & investigations.
She was diagnosed with high Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension and after 3 days of hospitalisation she felt much better.
Thanks to Dr. Kumar and the staff of the hospital for the timely treatment!
M.R. Gopinath

Doctor was very friendly.He explained why pacemaker needed for me.During procedure also he was encouraging.After implanting the pacemaker and periodical check up one of the portion was using almost 100 percent of pacemakers.He has rightly diagnised the problem and Now I am comfortable

Dr. Kumar Kenchappa is very approachable and highly communicative. His treatment is an amalgamation of conservative thoughts with modern medicines which makes one feel at ease. He is more like having a doctor at home who is accessible and thus very comforting .

I met so many doctors via practo app. He is a good doctor and I met the doctor twice for my child's cardiology related treatment. I am satisfied with doctor treatment and I would say the treatment was average. Staff, timings and everything was good in hospital and I would like to give a rating of 8/10 to the hospital.

Dr.Kumar has quickly conducted my surgery but also assisted and helped my friends and family about my heart condition and the reason for surgery.
This has immensely helped in giving confidence to my family at time of distress. During surgery also Dr.Kumar was constantly assuring me about progress made on my surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ********* ******* Listened patiently, was cool approach which make patient calm down, explained what to do and not to, gave suggestions without force, attended to patient very well. First virtue of doctor is friendliness and second,  affordable fee. Most people hesiate going to specialists due to high fees and subsequent costs. But in Dr Kumar, his treatment is affordable for common people with specific issues which is a great thing.

Doctor  good friendly behaves .treatment good and also hospital environment good .I am satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: First I met Dr.Aravind, he examined me well then advised me to contact Cardiologist. I met Dr.Kumar Kenchappa, he examined me well in three fields. (1) ECG (2) 2D Echo (3)Blood Test related to Heart. But to my luck all the reports are Normal. Finally, he doubted about aortic dissection and advised me to go for 2D Scan coronery Anjioyegraphy at Celerio Diagnostic center. I underwent scanning and gone to Narayana Hrudhyalaya for treatment.  Here I salute both Dr.Aravind and Dr Kumar for detecting my problem. Thank you Doctors.
reply_text: Dear patient , thanks for the review. We are happy that you got correct diagnosis done at the right time . We would have been more happier if you had come back to us for the treatment as well . We are well versed and equipped to treat critical conditions like aortic dissection and aneurysm. We wish you a speedy recovery .

review: OK Doctor listen my issues and all relevant test done and explains me in details of the issues with patience.

 life saviour.. . . My mom had  a heart attack and without Dr kumar.. things would have gone very bad.... Thanks Doc

review: I was Taking BP Medicine Past 2 Years but after Meeting Dr Kumar Within 3 Month My BP tablet has Stopped , He Changed First his own way and Given Some Medicine after 2 Month Told to stop Medicine. Now I am Checking Regular BP it's Quite Normal and Feeling More Comfortable without Medicine. he just to do Regular Checking.  very Rarely we found this type of ********** Doctor.

I had a wonderful experience with DrKenchappa. Dr was always v polite and smiling which is very important for a patient. He was always there to answer my endless doubts. I will certainly recommend him to anyone who needs any kind of help from him. He made things very easy for me because of his friendly nature. I would like to thank him profusely.  ***** ****** *

We had visited the doctor as my father had a health issue related to the heart. He had an attack. The doctor was excellent and good. He is continuing medicines that were prescribed. We did potassium tests and angioplasty tests. There was no waiting time in the hospital. My father is fine now. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. We missed routine checkups in march month, we need to go again.

I met the doctor. Doctor behaviour was good and he listened to our problem very well. I went for an angioplasty and I am satisfied with the doctor treatment. Already I recommended this doctor to other patients. There was normal waiting time in the hospital. Staff and reception people were very good and cooperative. I would like to give 4/5 stars to the hospital.

I went for an ECG test ulcer treatment and he prescribed vitamin- d medicines which were helpful to cure the problem. I would like to recommend this doctor to others. I will give a ratingof 9/10 to the hospital. Staff and everything was good in the hospital.
